title: Loving My Boss
description: Scott and Betty are enjoying the fruits of their new life and freedom to the fullest, in every sense of the word. Their unlikely romance blossoms from its roots in the Faulty Trilogy. Secrets are revealed along the way and the measure of their devotion to one another is tested.Will their love survive? Are you anxious to find out what has become of Betty, the wounded soul desperately looking for love, and her love interest and boss, Scott?Get ready for a wild and steamy ride narrated by Betty in her unrestrained and naughty voice!NOTESLoving My Boss is a hot and steamy contemporary romance short story with a happily ever after and no cliffhanger. It is recommended to be read after the Faulty Trilogy.Oh... and be forewarned, this book is intended for mature audiences.Enjoy!
author: Kaleb Kilton
